SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.phone

Interface IPhoneNormalizerPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
public interface IPhoneNormalizerPlugin extends InternalPlugin
Plugin for normalizing phone numbers. Default implementation is the DefaultPhoneNormalizerPlugin.gs
See Also:
  • PhoneUtil

    • isPossibleNumber

      boolean isPossibleNumber(String value)
      This method will determine whether or not a string object can be a viable phone number. It should be a country independent check and contain a fairly loose validator. This method does not allow for extensions.
      Parameters:
      value - String value is
      Returns:
      boolean

    • isPossibleNumberWithExtension

      boolean isPossibleNumberWithExtension(String value)
      This method will determine whether or not a string object can be a viable phone number. It should be a country independent check and contain a fairly loose validator. This method allows for extensions.
      Parameters:
      value - PhoneNumber to be formatted
      Returns:
      boolean

    • isValidExtension

      boolean isValidExtension(String value)
      Calculates whether or not the extension is valid
      Parameters:
      value -
      Returns:

    • getMaximumExtensionLength

      int getMaximumExtensionLength()
      The maximum length allowed for phone extensions. Configurable to be anything between 1 through 7. Please be aware that the actual enforcement is through the regular expressions in the OOTB plugins. This is only used for error reporting purposes.
      Returns:

    • normalizeNumberIfPossible

      String normalizeNumberIfPossible(String value)
      This method will strip out all formats and decorators from the national subscriber column. It should call, isPossibleNumber(String) before normalizing the string. The method should return the original string if isPossibleNumber returns false This is a convenience method for normalizeNumberIfPossible(value, false);
      Parameters:
      value - PhoneNumber to be formatted
      Returns:
      String

    • normalizeNumberIfPossible

      String normalizeNumberIfPossible(String value, boolean generateStackTrace)
      This method will strip out all formats and decorators from the national subscriber column. It should call, isPossibleNumber(String) before normalizing the string. The method should return the original string if isPossibleNumber returns false
      Parameters:
      value - PhoneNumber to be formatted
      generateStackTrace - generates a stacktrace if an unnormalizable value is passed in. Useful for debugging
      Returns:
      String

    • parsePhoneNumber

      GWPhoneNumber parsePhoneNumber(String value)
      This method will convert a string to a GWPhoneNumber object using the default phone country value specified in config.xml. It can be used to convert a phone number from Guidewire 7 and below to Guidewire 8.
      Parameters:
      value - PhoneNumber to be formatted
      Returns:
      GWPhoneNumber

    • formatPhoneNumber

      String formatPhoneNumber(GWPhoneNumber number)
      This method will convert a GWPhoneNumber object to a formatted string based on the object's country code, national subscriber number and extension. The output will be based on the server's default phone country code. This method can used to convert Guidewire 8 phone numbers to Guidewire 7 and below.
      Parameters:
      number - PhoneNumber to be formatted
      Returns:
      String

    • normalizePhoneNumbersInBean

      void normalizePhoneNumbersInBean(KeyableBean bean)
      This method will allow you to implement the logic necessary to normalize all phone numbers in a bean.
      Parameters:
      bean -

    • normalizePhoneNumbersInArchive

      void normalizePhoneNumbersInArchive(IArchivedEntity archive, List<PhoneColumnProperties> phoneColumns)
      This method will allow you to implement the logic necessary to normalize all phone numbers in an archive.
      Parameters:
      archive -
